Date: 07/30/2023

# Passage

**An old sanskrit passage**

यो अस्याध्यक्षः परमे व्योमन्त्सो अङ्ग वेद यदि वा न वेद ॥७॥

> He who is the presiding deity of this universe in the supreme sky knows it or does not know it.

This is the transliteration of the Sanskrit:  yo asyādhyakṣaḥ param vyomanthso aiga ceda yadi vā na veda


# Muse Channeling

I have sought to escape my negative perceptions by working toward noble pursuits.
